TopicTitle: Game 'softlocks' on trying to swap crew.

Articles.Content:
Oh hello there. I have a heavily modded KSP 1.7.0 OPM install, which I have using to complete a Jool-5 Mission. The problem is, after updating to 1.7, I am not able to swap/select/remove crew from vessels in the VAB or SPH. I was making a crew recovery vessel and two kerbonauts snuck onboard, so when I reverted to remove them, upon pressing the crew tab, the game kinda softlocks.

All the buttons grey out on the left side. I am unable to swap crew, change action groups or add any part. I am able to swap facilities, but the problem persists. The right side is mostly unaffected - I am able to create a new vessel (although I cannot add anything), open a saved vessel, launch or exit. But sometimes, this goes as well.

Quicksaving and quickloading, or a hard reset don't help. I have confirmed this isn't stock beahviour. I'm currently stopped work on that install (I launched the vessel i needed to complete the mission by removing the crew on the launchpad and recovering them), but since I have such a large modlist (for me atleast), I don't know where to start with finding which mod works. Furthermore, the mod loading times are rather big, so repeatedly testing which mods or mods combinations cause this would a huge hassle.

I post this in order to find whether other users are also experiencing this, or whether anyone can give any insight on which mods to test.

https://imgur.com/5om5dat 

Here is a picture of my Game Data folder, incase you want to check for any mod.

Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thank you in advance!

The cause is in Action Groups (Re)Extended. I've already reported it to LGG. And it looks like he posted a fix.

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/167269-17-action-groups-reextended-250-action-groups-in-flight-editing/
